section.name: About MMM Util::Reflect
section.p: This module contains utilities to deal with POJOs (Plain Old Java Objecgts) easily. It fully supports the generic type-system of Java5+ and is NOT limited to Java-beans.
section.subsection:
Here are some of the features provided by this module:
Advanced POJO-Introspection.
POJO-Navigation for accessing entire object-webs easily.
